title: temp folder error fix please?
body:
Alright so I keep having this error and I tried googling how to fix it but nothing useful has shown up and it's getting annoying.

the error happens every time my game ends win or lose as soon as the nexus explodes and I click the victory or defeat button to exit out of the game instead of closing the game and relunching the client. the game freezes and goes not responding poping up a window that tells me that temp folder error.

I've uninstalled and reinstalled league multiple times now and it still wont fix it. please for the love of toxic community help a brother out!

replies.body: This could happen if your OS is running on 32 bit, but we'd really need more info to know what's going on for sure.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to grab some logs for context, and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team will work with you directly and help figure out what's happening.  See you there!
